Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Interfaces
ro.isdc.wro.model.resource.support.hash.HashBuilder
          use HashStrategy instead. 
 

Deprecated Classes
ro.isdc.wro.model.resource.processor.decorator.AbstractProcessorDecorator
          use ProcessorDecorator instead. 
ro.isdc.wro.extensions.manager.ExtensionsConfigurableWroManagerFactory
          Use ConfigurableWroManagerFactory instead. 
ro.isdc.wro.model.resource.support.naming.HashEncoderNamingStrategy
          prefer Using DefaultHashEncoderNamingStrategy. 
ro.isdc.wro.manager.factory.InjectableWroManagerFactoryDecorator
          Not required anymore. The WroManager objects are injected in WroManager.Builder during initialization. This class with be removed in 1.7.0. 
 

Deprecated Fields
ro.isdc.wro.config.factory.FilterConfigWroConfigurationFactory.PARAM_VALUE_DEPLOYMENT
           
 

Deprecated Methods
ro.isdc.wro.http.WroFilter.configureDefaultHeaders(Map)
          use WroFilter#newResponseHeaderConfigurer() and ResponseHeadersConfigurer.configureDefaultHeaders(Map) 
ro.isdc.wro.model.WroModel.getGroupByName(String)
          use WroModelInspector.getGroupByName(String) 
ro.isdc.wro.model.WroModel.getGroupNames()
          use WroModelInspector.getGroupNames() 
ro.isdc.wro.model.WroModel.getGroupNamesContainingResource(String)
          use WroModelInspector.getGroupNamesContainingResource(String) 
ro.isdc.wro.manager.factory.InjectableWroManagerFactoryDecorator.getInjector()
           
ro.isdc.wro.http.WroFilter.onRuntimeException(RuntimeException, HttpServletResponse, FilterChain)
          use WroFilter.onException(Exception, HttpServletResponse, FilterChain) 
ro.isdc.wro.manager.callback.LifecycleCallbackRegistry.registerCallback(LifecycleCallback)
          use LifecycleCallbackRegistry.registerCallback(ObjectFactory) instead to ensure thread-safety. 
ro.isdc.wro.manager.WroManager.registerCallback(LifecycleCallback)
           
ro.isdc.wro.model.resource.processor.impl.css.CssDataUriPreProcessor.replaceWithDataUri(String)
          use CssDataUriPreProcessor.isReplaceAccepted(String) instead. 
ro.isdc.wro.manager.factory.BaseWroManagerFactory.setHashBuilder(HashStrategy)
          use BaseWroManagerFactory.setHashStrategy(HashStrategy) 
ro.isdc.wro.extensions.processor.css.CssLintProcessor.setOptions(String...)
           
ro.isdc.wro.extensions.processor.js.AbstractLinterProcessor.setOptions(String...)
           
ro.isdc.wro.http.support.ResponseHeadersConfigurer.useDefaultsFromConfig(WroConfiguration, Map)
          will be removed when other deprecated methods requiring this method will be removed. 
ro.isdc.wro.util.WroUtil.wrapWithWroRuntimeException(Exception)
          use WroRuntimeException.wrap(Exception)
